topic.title: How to Add a Draft Watermark Above the Text

body.p: If you want the watermark to be displayed above the text, instead of using the standard background-image property you can use the -oxy-foreground-image property:

You can set a more specific selector if you just need to display the foreground in a subset group of pages (for example, chapter). In this case the above selector will not change it, as it is more specific.
body.note: Prefer the usage of SVG images as other image types suffer from pixelation and because foreground images are stretched to the whole page size.
